=== About me ===

I'm a Hungarian freelance translator, living in Eger, Hungary.

Among other free software (<nowiki>[[http://l10n.gnome.org/languages/hu/|Gnome]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://translationproject.org/team/hu.html|GNU Translation Project]]</nowiki>, Xfce, Pidgin, Vlc), I'm translating Ubuntu to Hungarian, and organizing the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-l10n-hu|ubuntu-l10n-hu]]</nowiki> team, which I founded 4 years ago. I'm also reporting the i18n bugs I found, and occasionally talk about localization at local conferences.

=== Contributions ===

* Founded the ubuntu-l10n-hu team, and leading it since then
* Countless translations <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/~kelemeng|here]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://cia.vc/stats/author/kelemeng|there]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu.hu/node/1162|Organized]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[http://hup.hu/node/37785|many]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu.hu/node/4705|translation]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu.hu/node/5741|sprints]]</nowiki> in 2007-2008, the first (and most <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/rosetta-users/2006-March/001321.html|successful]]</nowiki> :P) being in <nowiki>[[http://hup.hu/node/10487|2006]]</nowiki>
* Speaking about l10n at the <nowiki>[[http://konf.ubuntu.hu/2006/program_honositas.html|2006]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://konf.ubuntu.hu/2008/program/forditasmenedzsment-az-alapoktol/|2008]]</nowiki> Hungarian Ubuntu Conferences
* Motivating other people (like <nowiki>[[Sianis]]</nowiki>) to contribute :)

=== Plans for the near future ===

* Keeping Ubuntu's Hungarian localization <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/HungarianTeam/TranslationCoordination|healthy]]</nowiki>
* Finishing the translation of the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/HungarianTeam/TranslationCoordination#Kubuntu%20Karmic|Kubuntu Desktop Guide]]</nowiki>
* Translating the entire Ubuntu Server Guide
* Organizing the second Hungarian Ubuntu Academy, an outreach event for new Ubuntu activists
* Creating a Hungarian speaking podcast about open source software and Ubuntu, with <nowiki>[[Toros3]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[SzilveszterFarkas]]</nowiki>

=== Plans for the far future ===

* Keeping up the work I'm already doing :)
* Convincing new potential activists that contributing to Ubuntu is fun
